conversation.message: Remove the brackets and simplify (2x + 1)².

To simplify (2x + 1)², expand it as (2x + 1)(2x + 1). Use the distributive property (FOIL method): Multiply 2x by 2x to get 4x², 2x by 1 to get 2x, 1 by 2x to get 2x, and 1 by 1 to get 1. Combine all the terms: 4x² + 2x + 2x + 1 simplifies to 4x² + 4x + 1. The simplified expression is: 4x² + 4x + 1. Do you understand this step?
